item.title: Flash Hash: Sept 11, 2022
item.description: 1 Podcast Embed 2 Youtube Embed 3 DescriptionExecutive Producer, Christian, attempts to keep Corey, Dee, and Jessie on topic and within two a minutes a piece on three timely topics. This episode includes the Ethereum merge, Crypto Leaks piece on Avalanche and Kyle Roche, and decentralized weather stations. 4 Sponsors Here is sponsor content
